document_data.mainbody:
The Calling was a mysterious evil that plagued Kara-Tur in the late 12 century DR.
Sometime circa the , the being only known as The Calling targeted Azaki guild in Kara-Tur. The Calling enthralled a minor attendant, part of the Azaki assassins guild, and in exchange for uplifting the attendants family, it used the humans body to house its own soul. Now infiltrating the guild, The Calling sowed chaos, generating numerous copies of enchanted shurikens called Many Talons, seemingly at will. Eventually, The Callings attendant body was slain by an unnamed sohei.
